blogPost.title: Insufficient sleep can have widespread damaging effects on physical and mental health, including increased risk of developing heart disease, high blood pressure, stroke and Type 2 diabetes, a growing body of evidence suggests. https://t.co/7t4kkTu9K5
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: Breaking News: The Justice Department sued Texas on Monday over the state's plan to redraw its voting districts, saying the new map would discriminate against Black and Latino voters, essentially making their votes count for less than fellow citizens'. https://t.co/YIb0lbjnH9

localize.full_text: Breaking Newsです。司法省は月曜日、テキサス州の選挙区再編成計画をめぐり、新しい地図は黒人やラテン系の有権者を差別し、彼らの票の価値を他の市民の票よりも低くするものだと訴えた。https://t.co/YIb0lbjnH9
突发新闻。司法部周一就该州重新划分投票区的计划起诉德克萨斯州，称新地图将歧视黑人和拉丁裔选民，基本上使他们的选票比其他公民的选票少。https://t.co/YIb0lbjnH9。
突發新聞。司法部週一就該州重新劃分投票區的計劃起訴德克薩斯州，稱新地圖將歧視黑人和拉丁裔選民，基本上使他們的選票比其他公民的選票少。https://t.co/YIb0lbjnH9。

next.title:
A court in Myanmar is expected to deliver the first verdicts against the country’s ousted civilian leader, Daw Aung San Suu Kyi. She is facing a series of rulings that could keep her locked up for the rest of her life.

Follow live updates. https://t.co/whyi8BbmrP
